entry.title: *New Kensington MicroSaver Master Keyed Laptop Locks K64581US
entry.s:type: Computers/Tablets & Networking:Laptop & Desktop Accessories:Anti-Theft Locks & Kits
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kensington
Type: Computers/Tablets & Networking:Laptop & Desktop Accessories:Anti-Theft Locks & Kits
Price: 19.99




New Kensington MicroSaver Master Keyed Laptop Locks K64581US

Kensington K64581US


MicroSaver Master Keyed Lock


Maintain control of all locksÂ with a master key solution


The MicroSaver Master Keyed Lock - On Demand is a stocked master access solution and the most popular option for corporate users. Master keyed solutions give you more control over equipment while safeguarding employees from notebook and data theft. Master keyed options also protect against down-time caused by lost keys. You get - Unique locks and keys on each individual product in an order. Plus, one master key that can open all the locks in the order. Made of reinforced steel and Kevlar brand fiber this cable is 40% stronger and forms the first line of defense against notebook and data theft.

Terms and Conditions
